summary: Now you too can be an Idiot in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center]We should have acted. It's already here.
Weeurey brought about it's return.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75066/?]The follower-mod was merely a delay,[/url] 'til the time after Project Pew was uploaded to the Nexus, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/?]when HHaley made his voice-mod.[/url]
But no one wanted to believe... Believe it even existed. And when the truth finally shows it's head... It's a head like a f***in' orange!
And... he is finally here. In their tongue, he is [b][i]"PILKINGTON": ORANGEBORN![/i][/b][/center]

Now you, yes [i]you[/i], can be an Idiot in Skyrim with the help HHaley's PC Head Tracking and Voice Type mod.

This mod includes such famous Karl Dilkington gems like:

"Isn't part of fillin' your head with stuff the journey of fillin' it with that stuff" (on level-up).

"BOZWOLLOCKS!" (when using offensive magic)

"PEW!" (when firing bow or crossbow).

"Don't solve problems, because a problem solved is a problem caused (on opening quest journal).

"I could eat a knob at night" (plays when using a bloodcursed arrow to blot out the sun).

And many more.


This is an addon voicepack for HHaley's PC Headtracking mod using the voice of Karl Dilkington. This mod contains no copyrighted files.


Requires: PC Head Tracking and Voice Type by HHaley: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72039/?


Special Thanks:

DECK16, for uploading the original "An Idiot in Skyrim" Karl Dilkington follower mod.

weeurey, for re-uploading said mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75066/?

bigirpall, for "Project P.E.W.": https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10609


HHaley, for the PC Head Tracking and Voice Type mod.


Karl Dilkington for his wonderful contributions to "The Ricky Gervais Show," "An Idiot Abroad," and the world.
author: ArgonianSoldier
